description.labels: Label strings - replace for translation etc
description.sortable: Makes each th a button that sorts corresponding cells in column
description.filterable: Renders a field for real time filtering
description.showSum: Shows the sum of each column at the bottom of the table
description.fullscreen: Renders a button, that when clicked, makes the table fullscreen
description.isMultidimensional: Makes the first column a second dimension of headers and locks in it place when scrolling. Also allows the user to collapse the first column.
description.title: A title at above the table
